text: George Rithe (1523–1561) was MP for Petersfield from October 1553 to April 1554, and then again from 1559 until his death. A lawyer, he was from Northington."The House of Commons, 1509–1558, Volume 1" Bindoff, S.T. p199: London; Secker & Warburg; 1982 ==References== Category:1523 births Category:1561 deaths Category:People from Hampshire Category:16th-century English people Category:English MPs 1553 (Mary I) Category:English MPs 1559
title: George Rithe
